document_data.name: Alter normal winds
document_data.mainbody: '''''Alter normal winds''''' was a [[spell]] unique to [[Zakhara]]{{ZakharanSpells}}, the Land of Fate. This spell was only usable by [[wizard]]s.
document_data.Effects:
With this spell the caster could harness normal wind and increase its power to the next state. Becalmed wind could be changed into a breeze, a storm could be changed into a gale, etc.

This spell had no effect on creatures from the [[Elemental Plane of Air]].
document_data.Components: A small silver tube was needed to cast this spell. The caster would blow into the tube to attract the wind's attention.
